snippet.title: VARION Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Blast your friends at the speed of light in this futuristic brawler where only bounce shots are lethal! Team up or fight for yourself, build dirty tactics and take advantage of ever-changing dangerous stages in up-to-4 player restless battles.
Plunge into the couch multiplayer hornet's nest or sharpen your skills against ferocious waves of armored bots in solo/coop mode to become the supreme ruler of your living room.
BE FAST. BE WICKED. NEVER BE BORED!

Official website : http://www.varion-game.com
Steam page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/788330/Varion/
